Index.meta_title: MarkM8 - AI Essay Feedback for Students
Index.meta_description: Get actionable essay feedback with indicative grade ranges and targeted improvements. Designed by students, for students. Just $1 per essay.

Hero.title: Ready to <gradient>Improve Your Grade</gradient>?
Hero.description: See where you stand before you submit. Get an estimated grade, know exactly what to improve, and hand in your best work — every time.
Hero.privacy_note: Your data stays private — used only for your feedback
Hero.disclaimer: Grades are estimates and do not replace formal marking.

HowItWorks.section_description: Get actionable feedback in three easy steps
HowItWorks.step1_description: Upload a file (DOCX, PDF, TXT) or paste your essay along with the assignment brief and rubric.
HowItWorks.step2_description: Industry-leading AI models, fine-tuned for academic grading, review your essay in parallel.
HowItWorks.step3_description: See your estimated grade and exactly what to fix. Make targeted improvements and submit with confidence.

Features.section_description: Know where you stand before you submit
Features.feature1_description: The best AI models available, purpose-built and fine-tuned specifically for academic essay grading.
Features.feature2_description: Stop guessing if your essay is good enough. See your estimated grade and exactly what to fix to push it higher.
Features.feature3_description: Upload your assignment rubric and our AI reviews against it, just like your professor would.
Features.feature4_description: No more waiting. Get comprehensive feedback in about 2 minutes, any time of day.
Features.feature5_description: No subscriptions. Just buy credits when you need them. One credit = one essay reviewed.
Features.feature6_description: Your data stays private and is only used for your feedback. Never shared or used for AI training.

SampleFeedback.section_description: Explore sample grades across different subjects and academic levels

Testimonials.section_description: Feedback from students who've used MarkM8
Testimonials.testimonial1_quote: MarkM8 helped me understand exactly where my essay was weak. The feedback was specific and actionable.
Testimonials.testimonial2_quote: I used to stress about whether my essays were good enough. Now I get instant feedback before submitting.
Testimonials.testimonial3_quote: The three AI models approach gives me confidence the grade is accurate. Saved me so much time.

Pricing.section_title: Pay Per Essay, Not Per Month
Pricing.section_description: No subscriptions. Buy credits when you need them. One credit = one essay graded.
Pricing.price_note: No subscription. Pay only when you need it.

FAQ.section_description: Everything you need to know about MarkM8
FAQ.question1: How does the AI feedback work?
FAQ.answer1: MarkM8 uses industry-leading AI models, purpose-built for academic grading, to review your essay. Each model evaluates your work against your rubric to provide balanced, reliable feedback with an estimated grade range.
FAQ.answer2: Yes. Your essay is stored securely and used only for your feedback. We never share your work or use it for AI training. Your data stays private and is only used for its intended purpose.
FAQ.answer3: Our AI is fine-tuned specifically for academic essay grading — not generic AI. By using the best models available, we achieve more balanced results than generic tools. Grades are estimates to help guide your improvement.
FAQ.question4: What types of essays can I submit?
FAQ.answer4: MarkM8 works with any type of academic essay - argumentative, analytical, research papers, literature reviews, and more. Upload a file (DOCX, PDF, TXT) or paste your essay with the assignment brief and rubric.
FAQ.answer5: Most essays are reviewed in about 2 minutes. You'll see real-time status updates while your essay is being analyzed.
FAQ.question6: What if I want different feedback?
FAQ.answer6: You can submit any essay again using another credit. Each review is independent, so you may get slightly different perspectives. This is a feature, not a bug — it mirrors how different markers might view your work.

CTA.title: Ready to See Your Grade?
CTA.description: Know where you stand before you submit. Your first essay is free.
CTA.note: No credit card required. 1 free credit on signup.

Footer.disclaimer: MarkM8 provides formative feedback to support learning. Grades are estimates and do not replace formal academic marking.
